title: Building permissions for the Urban Renewal development shall be as per the procedure laid down under clause no
clause_text: Building permissions for the Urban Renewal development shall be as per the procedure laid down under clause no. 2.1 to 2.8 of Regulation No.33(10) A.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Building permissions for the Urban Renewal development shall be as per the procedure laid down under clause no. 2.1 to 2.8 of Regulation No.33(10) A.
